name: Edgewear Sienna
description:
Stegman's Edgewear utility clothes are made from reinforced nylon weaves and lined with temperature-rated quilted technology to provide you with a little extra protection while on the jobsite. Double knees, reinforced joint pads and extra pockets add comfort and durability to this field-tested and worker-approved clothing line.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
施特格曼的耐磨多用途工作服由增强尼龙编织制成,在工作现场衬有耐高温缝合技术的工作服为您提供额外的保护. 双膝上加固的关节护垫和额外的口袋为这条饱经现场检验和工人认可的服装提升了极大的舒适度和耐用性.
女款目前缺货.
